alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:28AM CDT until July 20 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN UNION...NORTH CENTRAL ALEXANDER AND EAST CENTRAL CAPE GIRARDEAU COUNTIES... At 927 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ware, or near Trail Of Tears State Park, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Anna, Jonesboro, Trail Of Tears State Park, Ware and Mill Creek. This includes Interstate 55 near Mile Marker 103. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
